fields.label: SureLC Instructions
fields.name: surelc_instructions
fields.instructions: Users who sign up for online contracting through SureLC Carriers will see this text. Available tokens: {carrier_list} (list of SureLC Carriers the user has chosen), {walkthru_video} (URL of the SureLC Walk-Thru Video - this video will show as an embed when viewing this confirmation from the web or as a link when viewing from email).

fields.label: SureLC Walk-Thru Video
fields.name: surelc_walkthru_video
fields.instructions: Provide a URL to the SureLC Walk-Thru Video.

fields.label: Standard Instructions
fields.name: standard_instructions
fields.instructions: Users who sign up for contracting through Standard Carriers will see these instructions. Available tokens: {carrier_list} (list of Standard Carriers the user has chosen).
